Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class represent the board, called in italian "Plancia", of each individual player. It contains the towers a player has chosen, the professors earned by him and the students present in the entrance and hall
Author:
Dario d'Abate

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numPlayer)
      Constructor of the class. It can handle games for 2 or 3 players
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - Number of player
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if it is passed a number of player that's neither 2 nor 3

  • Method Details

    • chooseTower

      public void chooseTower(Tower color)
      This method is invoked by a player to choose his tower's color
      Parameters:
      color - It is the color chosen by each individual player

    • getTowerColor

      public Tower getTowerColor()
      Getter that return the tower's color
      Returns:
      the tower's color chosen by a player

    • getNumTower

      public int getNumTower()
      Getter that return the number of remaining towers
      Returns:
      number of remaining towers of a player

    • decNumTower

      public void decNumTower()
      This method is invoked every time a player conquer an island. If there are remaining towers it decreases the number by one, otherwise unchanged

    • incNumTower

      public void incNumTower()
      This method is invoked every time a player has to retrieve his towers from an island. If there are some missing towers in the board it increases the number by one, otherwise the number is unchanged

    • entranceSize

      public int entranceSize()
      Gets the total number of students in the entrance
      Returns:
      the overall number of students in the entrance

    • entranceSize

      public int entranceSize(Color color)
      Gets the number of students in the entrance of the color specified as parameter
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the students in the entrance
      Returns:
      Number of students of a determined color in the entrance

    • hallSize

      public int hallSize()
      Gets the total number of students in the hall
      Returns:
      the overall number of students in the hall

    • hallSize

      public int hallSize(Color color)
      Gets the number of students in the hall of the color specified as parameter
      Parameters:
      color - color of the students in the hall
      Returns:
      number of students of a determined color in the hall

    • entranceIsFillable

      public boolean entranceIsFillable()
      Indicates whether a student can be placed in the entrance
      Returns:
      true if the entrance can be filled with a student, false otherwise

    • addProfessor

      public void addProfessor(Color color)
      This method add a professor to a player's board if it is not contained in the set, otherwise the sei is unchanged
      Parameters:
      color - color of the professor to be added

    • removeProfessor

      public void removeProfessor(Color color)
      This method removes an existing professor from a player's board, otherwise the set of professor is unchanged
      Parameters:
      color - color of the professor to be removed

    • getProfessors

      public Set<Color> getProfessors()
      Getter method that return the set of professor contained in a player's board
      Returns:
      the copy of the set of professors

    • fillEntrance

      public void fillEntrance(Color color)
      This method put a single student in the entrance
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the student to be added

    • entranceToHall

      public void entranceToHall(Color studentColor)
      This method moves a student from entrance to hall if the movement can be done, otherwise entrance and hall are unchanged
      Parameters:
      studentColor - It is the color of the student to be moved from entrance to hall
